Package ch.idsia.crema.model

Interface Domain

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DomainBuilder, SimpleDomain, Strides
    public interface Domain

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean contains​(int variable)
      Check if the specified variable is present in the domain
      int getCardinality​(int variable)
      Get the cardinality of a variable in the domain
      int getSize()
      Get the number of variables in the domain.
      int getSizeAt​(int index)
      Get the cardinality of the variable at the specified offset in the domain.
      int[] getSizes()
      Get all the cardinalities of the variables in the domain.
      int[] getVariables()
      The vector of variables in this domain.
      int indexOf​(int variable)
      Find the location/offset of a variable in the domain.
      void removed​(int variable)
      Notify the domain that a variable has been removed.

      • getSizeAt

        int getSizeAt​(int index)

        Get the cardinality of the variable at the specified offset in the domain.

        This method is usually used with the result of indexOf(int).

        Parameters:
        index -
        Returns:

        int getSize()
        Get the number of variables in the domain.
        Returns:

      • removed

        void removed​(int variable)
        Notify the domain that a variable has been removed. Prior to remove a variable the model will have to remove all arcs involving the variable. Because of this domains should not contain the removed variable.

        An IllegalStateException may be thrown if the removed variable is part of the domain

        Parameters:
        variable -
